SELECT A.simulationUuid, A.groupId, A.userId, A.simulationTitle, A.scienceAppId, A.scienceAppName, A.simulationCreateDt, A.cluster, A.classId, A.customId, A.testYn, A.scienceAppVersion, B.jobSeqNo, B.simulationUuid, B.groupId, B.jobUuid, B.jobStatus, B.jobStartDt, B.jobEndDt, B.jobTitle, B.jobExecPath, B.jobPhase, B.jobSubmitDt, B.jobUniversityField, B.jobInputDeckYn, B.jobInputDeckName, B.jobSubmit, IFNULL(SEC_TO_TIME(unix_timestamp(B.jobStartDt)-unix_timestamp(B.jobSubmitDt)),'')as stayDt, IFNULL(SEC_TO_TIME(unix_timestamp(B.jobEndDt)-unix_timestamp(B.jobStartDt)),'')as executeDt, <isNotEmpty property="groupList"> if( COUNT(*) > 1, 'Y', 'N' ) AS jobCnt </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="jobListSearch"> 'N' AS jobCnt </isNotEmpty>

FROM EDSIM_Simulation A,EDSIM_SimulationJob B, User_ C WHERE A.simulationUuid = B.simulationUuid AND B.jobStatus > 1701004 AND B.jobPhase = 1301003 AND A.groupId = #groupId# AND B.jobUuid IS NOT NULL AND A.userId = C.userId AND A.testYn != true AND B.jobSubmit = true <isNotEmpty property="simulationUuid"> AND A.simulationUuid = #simulationUuid# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="jobSeqNo"> AND B.jobSeqNo = #jobSeqNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.userId = #userId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="searchValue"> AND (A.scienceAppName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR B.jobTitle LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%') </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="searchValueAndUserId"> AND (A.scienceAppName LIKE '%@@searchValueAndUserId@@%' OR B.jobTitle LIKE '%@@searchValueAndUserId@@%' OR C.screenName LIKE '%@@searchValueAndUserId@@%') </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="jobStatus"> AND B.jobStatus = #jobStatus# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="classId"> AND A.classId = #classId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="customId"> AND A.customId = #customId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="groupList"> GROUP BY A.simulationUuid </isNotEmpty> ORDER BY A.simulationCreateDt DESC <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCnt FROM EDSIM_Simulation A,EDSIM_SimulationJob B, User_ C WHERE A.simulationUuid = B.simulationUuid AND B.jobStatus > 1701004 AND B.jobPhase = 1301003 AND A.groupId = #groupId# AND B.jobUuid IS NOT NULL AND A.userId = C.userId AND A.testYn != true AND B.jobSubmit = true <isNotEmpty property="simulationUuid"> AND A.simulationUuid = #simulationUuid# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="jobSeqNo"> AND B.jobSeqNo = #jobSeqNo# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="userId"> AND A.userId = #userId# </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="searchValue"> AND (A.scienceAppName LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%' OR B.jobTitle LIKE '%@@searchValue@@%') </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="searchValueAndUserId"> AND (A.scienceAppName LIKE '%@@searchValueAndUserId@@%' OR B.jobTitle LIKE '%@@searchValueAndUserId@@%' OR C.screenName LIKE '%@@searchValueAndUserId@@%') </isNotEmpty>
<isNotEmpty property="jobStatus"> AND B.jobStatus = #jobStatus# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="classId"> AND A.classId = #classId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="customId"> AND A.customId = #customId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="groupList"> GROUP BY A.simulationUuid </isNotEmpty> ORDER BY A.simulationCreateDt DESC <isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty> )A

FROM EDSIM_Simulation A,EDSIM_SimulationJob B, User_ C WHERE A.simulationUuid = B.simulationUuid AND B.jobStatus > 1701004 AND B.jobPhase = 1301003 AND B.jobUuid IS NOT NULL AND A.userId = C.userId AND A.testYn != true <isNotEmpty property="classId"> AND A.classId = #classId# </isNotEmpty> <isNotEmpty property="customId"> AND A.customId = #customId# </isNotEmpty> ORDER BY A.simulationCreateDt DESC
<isNotEmpty property="begin"> Limit #begin#, #end# </isNotEmpty>
